name: BrowserAct Powers Telegram Bot AI Music Recommendations for Spotify Blueprint
description:
Automate AI-powered data processing and Telegram delivery. Stop manual tasks—get intelligent, routed results in Telegram.
WHAT IT DOES:
Triggers via Telegram Bot for user requests/file inputs
Uses Google Gemini AI for content analysis/generation
Leverages BrowserAct + Iterator for multi-item web scraping
Processes data with Make AI Toolkit/Tools for customization
Delivers results to multiple Telegram Bot channels
Runs automatically on Telegram triggers
HOW IT WORKS:
Telegram Bot initiates workflow on updates
Google Gemini AI processes inputs (files, text)
Router directs flow; Iterator manages BrowserAct scraping
Tools/Make AI Toolkit customize data (set variables, run AI tasks)
Telegram Bots send formatted results
REQUIREMENTS:
BrowserAct account with web scraping workflows
Google Gemini AI access
Telegram Bot(s) for triggering/delivery
Make AI Toolkit/Tools integration
PERFECT FOR:
Content teams, data analysts needing AI-automated data processing with Telegram delivery.
TIME SAVED: 100-200 hours annually
SETUP TIME: 35-50 minutes
Streamline your AI workflow—automate Telegram-Gemini-BrowserAct-Telegram delivery!
